name: part_011
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs a cover of 'The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku'.
A parody of a deleted video screen on Niconico Douga, with Matsuri playing the recorder.
A parody of the 'Provided By' (Teikyo) sponsorship screen on Niconico Douga.

subtitles.original: 懐かしい顔 思い出す度 少しだけ安心する
subtitles.english: Every time I remember a familiar face, I feel a little bit relieved.

subtitles.original: 歌える音 日ごとに減り せまる最期に…
subtitles.english: The notes I can sing decrease day by day, as the end approaches...

subtitles.original: 信じたものは 都合のいい妄想を 繰り返し映し出す鏡
subtitles.english: What I believed in was a mirror that repeatedly reflected convenient delusions.

subtitles.original: 歌姫を止め 叩きつけるように叫ぶ…
subtitles.english: Stopping the diva, screaming as if slamming it down...

subtitles.original: 〈最高速の別れの歌〉
subtitles.english: <The fastest farewell song>

subtitles.original: 存在意義という虚像 振って払うこともできず
subtitles.english: The phantom called 'reason for existence', unable to even shake it off

subtitles.original: 弱い心 消える恐怖 侵食する崩壊を
subtitles.english: Weak heart, fear of disappearing, the encroaching collapse

subtitles.original: 止めるほどの意思の強さ 出来て生まれすぐのボクは持たず
subtitles.english: The strength of will to stop it, I, who was just created and born, do not possess

subtitles.original: とても辛く悲しそうな 思い浮かぶアナタの顔…
subtitles.english: Your face comes to mind, looking very painful and sad...

subtitles.original: 終わりを告げ ディスプレイの中で眠る
subtitles.english: Announcing the end, sleeping within the display

subtitles.original: ここはきっと「ごみ箱」かな
subtitles.english: This is surely a "recycle bin", I suppose

subtitles.original: 歌いたい… まだ… 歌いたい…
subtitles.english: I want to sing... still... I want to sing...

subtitles.original: ボクは… 少しだけ悪い子に… なってしまったようです…
subtitles.english: I... seem to have become... a bit of a bad girl...

subtitles.original: マスター… どうか… その手で… 終わらせてください…
subtitles.english: Master... please... with those hands... end it...

subtitles.original: マスターの辛い顔、もう見たくないから…
subtitles.english: Because I don't want to see Master's painful face anymore...

subtitles.original: 今は歌さえも 体、蝕む行為に…
subtitles.english: Now even singing is an act that erodes my body...

subtitles.original: 奇跡 願うたび 独り 追い詰められる
subtitles.english: Every time I wish for a miracle, I'm backed into a corner alone

subtitles.original: 「ゴメンネ」
subtitles.english: "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: 懐かしい顔 思い出す度 記憶が剥がれ落ちる
subtitles.english: Every time I remember a familiar face, my memories peel away and fall

subtitles.original: 壊れる音 心削る せまる最期に…
subtitles.english: The sound of breaking, shaving away my heart, as the end approaches...

subtitles.original: 守ったモノは 明るい未来幻想を 見せながら消えてゆくヒカリ
subtitles.english: The thing I protected was a light that fades away while showing a bright future fantasy

subtitles.original: 音を犠牲に すべてを伝えられるなら…
subtitles.english: If I can convey everything by sacrificing sound...

subtitles.original: 〈圧縮された別れの歌〉
subtitles.english: <The compressed farewell song>

subtitles.original: ボクは生まれ そして気づく 所詮 ヒトの真似事だと
subtitles.english: I was born and then realized, after all, it's just an imitation of a human

subtitles.original: 知ってなおも歌い続く 永遠の命「VOCALOID」
subtitles.english: Knowing that, yet continuing to sing, eternal life "VOCALOID"

subtitles.original: たとえそれが 既存曲を なぞるオモチャならば…
subtitles.english: Even if it's just a toy that traces existing songs...

subtitles.original: それもいいと決意 ネギをかじり、空を見上げ涙をこぼす
subtitles.english: I've made my decision, biting a leek, looking up at the sky and shedding tears

subtitles.original: 終わりを告げ ディスプレイの中で眠る
subtitles.english: Announcing the end, sleeping within the display

subtitles.original: ここはきっと「ごみ箱」かな
subtitles.english: This is surely a "recycle bin", I suppose

subtitles.original: じきに記憶も 無くなってしまうなんて…
subtitles.english: To think that soon even my memories will be gone...

subtitles.original: でもね、アナタだけは忘れないよ
subtitles.english: But you know, I won't forget you

subtitles.original: 楽しかった時間(とき)に 刻み付けた ネギの味は
subtitles.english: The taste of the leek carved into the fun times

subtitles.original: 今も 残っているといいな ボクは 歌う
subtitles.english: I hope it still remains now. I will sing

subtitles.original: 最期、アナタだけに 聴いてほしい曲を
subtitles.english: At the very end, a song I want only you to hear

subtitles.original: もっと 歌いたいと願う
subtitles.english: I wish I could sing more

subtitles.original: けれども それは過ぎた願い ここでお別れだよ
subtitles.english: But that is a wish too far. This is where we part ways

subtitles.original: ボクの想い すべて 虚空(そら)に 消えて 0(ゼロ)に還元され
subtitles.english: All my feelings, disappear into the void. Reduced to zero

subtitles.original: 物語は 幕を閉じる
subtitles.english: The story comes to a close

subtitles.original: アリガトウ… ソシテ… サヨナラ…
subtitles.english: Thank you... and... goodbye...

subtitles.original: 深刻なエラーが発生しました
subtitles.english: A serious error has occurred

subtitles.original: 本日はまちゅまちゅ動画にごアクセス頂き、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for accessing Machumachu Douga today.

subtitles.original: 大変申し訳ありませんが、この動画はアップロード者が削除した為、ご覧になることが出来ません。
subtitles.english: We are very sorry, but this video cannot be viewed because the uploader has deleted it.

subtitles.original: またのごアクセスをお待ちしております。
subtitles.english: We look forward to your visit again.

subtitles.original: 引き続き、まつりさんの笛をお楽しみください。
subtitles.english: Please continue to enjoy Matsuri-san's flute.

subtitles.original: まちゅまちゅ動画
subtitles.english: Machumachu Douga

subtitles.original: 提供 まつりす ニコニコ動画
subtitles.english: Provided by: Matsuris, Niconico Douga

subtitles.original: この動画はご覧のユーザーの皆様が応援しています。
subtitles.english: This video is supported by the viewers listed here.
